sort of way so SharePoint has two capabilities when it comes to custom development you can either deploy what's
called Full trust which means that that person has full Trust on that server
they can do very bad things if you allow them to now there's ways you can lock it down in SharePoint but you know it will
take work on your half on your on your behalf but in terms of full trust that person if you allow them they can access
the local disc they can access the network they can go and run an infinite Loop and so the SharePoint page actually never loads inside of there and times
out so full trust is one of these things that you'll want to make sure you verify the source whether you're running on
Prem or inside of the AWS Cloud uh and when you're actually developing your applications or SharePoint has this
capability called sandbox Solutions where you actually it's a limited sort of set of functionality for custom
development you are sandboxed into a set of things that you can do you can't access disc you can't access network uh
you know the SharePoint will kill you off if you try to do an infinite loop on the thing uh so it really is just a
Sandbox capabilities but again it is a subset of the SharePoint development environment so you may not be able to
